p: The oil reuse lag periods observed in Fig. 5(a–c), i.e. those determined from potato chip aldehyde levels only, were 5 episodes for trans-2-alkenals, 1-2 for trans,trans-alka-2,4-dienals, and 2 for n-alkanals respectively, and hence for each of these aldehyde classes, these values provide an indication of the maximum levels of repetitive use for sunflower oil when used for frying purposes according to our domestic deep-frying protocol.
